name: TOXIC WORLD THREE
description: Digitally altered photograph. 3472px by 2050px (300 ppi). 2112 A.D. Most of the world population has been wiped out by a pandemic which origin remains unknown. The rare survivors face countless dangers: infected water, rampant diseases, toxic fumes and--the worst predator of all--other survivors. Paradoxically, old radioactive material storage facilities are the safest havens.
